00047 class connect_options
00048 {
00050     MQTTAsync_connectOptions opts_;
00051 
00053     friend class async_client;
00054 
00055 public:
00059     typedef std::shared_ptr<connect_options> ptr_t;
00063     connect_options() : opts_( MQTTAsync_connectOptions_initializer ) {}
00068     int get_connection_timeout() const;
00069 
00070     //java.util.Properties getDebug()
00071            
00076     int get_keep_alive_interval() const {
00077         return opts_.keepAliveInterval;
00078     }
00083     std::string get_password() const {
00084         return std::string(opts_.password);
00085     }
00090     //javax.net.SocketFactory get_socket_factory();
00094     //java.util.Properties get_ssl_properties();
00099     std::string get_user_name() const { 
00100         return std::string(opts_.username);
00101     }
00106     std::string get_will_destination() const;
00111     message get_will_message() const;
00117     bool is_clean_session() const { return opts_.cleansession != 0; }
00123     void set_clean_session(bool cleanSession) {
00124         opts_.cleansession = (cleanSession) ? (!0) : 0;
00125     }
00130     void set_connection_timeout(int timeout) {
00131         opts_.connectTimeout = timeout;
00132     }
00137     void set_keep_alive_interval(int keepAliveInterval) {
00138         opts_.keepAliveInterval = keepAliveInterval;
00139     }
00143     void set_password(const std::string& password);
00147     //void set_socket_factory(javax.net.SocketFactory socketFactory)
00151     //void set_ssl_properties(java.util.Properties props);
00156     void set_user_name(const std::string& userName);
00165     void set_will(const topic& top, void* payload, size_t n, int qos, bool retained) {
00166         set_will(top.get_name(), payload, n, qos, retained);
00167     }
00176     void set_will(const std::string& top, void* payload, size_t n, int qos, bool retained);
00184     /*protected*/ void set_will(const std::string& top, message msg, int qos, bool retained);
00185 
00186     std::string to_str() const;
00187 };
